name: Comunicación
description:
TW: Grief, Death

This was made for the Unidos 2021 Jam "A Story Only YOU Can Tell"

This piece was really cathartic for me. It reflects my personal experiences with trying to speak with my family but struggling to find the right words. It's a pretty short experience, but I'm glad I was able to participate in the jam in any way I could :)

Hope you enjoy! <3
